{{Infobox Film | name = Film, Film, Film! | image = | image_size = | caption = | director = [[Fyodor Khitruk]] | producer = | writer = [[Vladimir Golovanov]], Fyodor Khitruk | narrator = | starring = | music = | cinematography = | editing = | distributor = [[Soyuzmultfilm]] | released = [[1968 in film|1968]] | runtime = 20 min | country = {{flagicon|USSR}} [[USSR]] | language = [[Russian language|Russian]] | budget = | gross = | preceded_by = | followed_by = }} '''''Film, Film, Film''''' (in [[Russian language|Russian]]: ''Ð¤Ð¸Ð»ÑÐ¼, ÑÐ¸Ð»ÑÐ¼, ÑÐ¸Ð»ÑÐ¼'') is a [[satire|satirical]] [[animation|animated]] short film made in [[1968 in film|1968]] in the [[Soviet Union]] by [[Fyodor Khitruk]].
It is a parody of the [[film making|filmmaking process]] in the [[USSR]]. The nearly-silent pantomime tells a story of making a historical movie. == Voice cast == * [[Aleksei Polevoy]] * [[Georgi Vitsin]]
== Interesting facts == * [[Lev Milchin]]{{fact|date=July 2008}}<!-- Sergei Eisenstein and Ivan Grozny movie? --> was a prototype for one of the main characters (''The Film Director''). * The main theme from the film was performed by the rock band ''[[Sokol (rock group)|Sokol]]''.
